subcontractingTerms.title: Términos de subcontratación
subcontractingTerms.description: Información sobre los términos que rigen la subcontratación.

hasSubcontracting.title: Subcontratación involucrada
hasSubcontracting.description: Si se subcontratará una parte del contrato.

subcontracting.title: Subcontratación
subcontracting.description: Información sobre las partes del contrato que el proveedor subcontratará a terceros.

subcontractingTerms.title: Términos de subcontratación
subcontractingTerms.description: Información sobre los términos que rigen la subcontratación.

hasSubcontracting.title: Subcontratación involucrada
hasSubcontracting.description: Whether a part of the contract will be subcontracted to third parties.

subcontracting.title: Subcontratación
subcontracting.description: Information about the parts of the contract that will be subcontracted to third parties.

SubcontractingTerms.title: Términos de subcontratación
SubcontractingTerms.description: Las obligaciones de los proveedores que subcontratan.

description.title: Descripción
description.description: Una descripción de los términos que rigen la subcontratación.

competitiveMaximumPercentage.title: Porcentaje máximo del valor del contrato para una subcontratación competitiva
competitiveMaximumPercentage.description: The maximum percentage of the contract value that the buyer or procuring entity allows the supplier to subcontract to third parties through a competitive procedure, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

competitiveMinimumPercentage.title: Porcentaje mínimo del valor del contrato para una subcontratación competitiva
competitiveMinimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage of the contract value that the buyer or procuring entity requires the supplier to subcontract to third parties through a competitive procedure, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

Subcontracting.title: Subcontratación
Subcontracting.description: Information about the parts of the contract that will be subcontracted to third parties.

description.title: Descripción
description.description: The description of the part of the contract that will be subcontracted to third parties.

maximumPercentage.title: Porcentaje máximo del valor del contrato
maximumPercentage.description: The maximum percentage of the contract value that will be subcontracted, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

minimumPercentage.title: Porcentaje mínimo del valor del contrato
minimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage of the contract value that will be subcontracted, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

competitiveMaximumPercentage.title: Porcentaje máximo del valor del contrato para una subcontratación competitiva
competitiveMaximumPercentage.description: The maximum percentage of the contract value that the buyer or procuring entity allows the supplier to subcontract to third parties through a competitive procedure, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

competitiveMinimumPercentage.title: Porcentaje mínimo del valor del contrato para una subcontratación competitiva
competitiveMinimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage of the contract value that the buyer or procuring entity requires the supplier to subcontract to third parties through a competitive procedure, expressed as a decimal proportion between 0 and 1.

value.title: Valor subcontratado
value.description: The estimated value of the part of the contract that will be subcontracted to third parties.

competitive.title: Subcontratación competitiva
competitive.description: Si el proveedor subcontratará parte del contrato a terceros mediante un procedimiento competitivo.

subcontracts.title: Subcontracts
subcontracts.description: Information about the subcontracts that will be established.

Subcontract.title: Subcontract
Subcontract.description: A relationship that suppliers establish with a third party to perform part of the contract on their behalf.

id.title: Identificador
id.description: The locally unique identifier for the subcontract.

subcontractor.title: Subcontratista
subcontractor.description: The organization that performs part of the contract on behalf of the suppliers.

mainContractors.title: Main contractors
mainContractors.description: The organizations to which the subcontractor will be subcontracted, if they are a subset of the tenderers submitting the bid or the suppliers receiving the award.
